Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Murphy's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point during the outbreak, Murphy joined a community in Ohio. Murphy is amongst the soldiers at the masquerade ball. After Tyler Davis causes a disruption trying to stand up to Pamela Milton , Mercer orders Murphy to guard the door. Murphy is one of the soldiers accompanying General Mercer on a mission beyond the city walls. He is seen with another soldier carrying a box. He and the other soldiers assist in clearing hordes of undead in the woods. Murphy is among the soldiers protecting the Estates as the Commonwealth is overrun by the herd . When the Coalition and Mercer 's loyal troops arrive, they enter into a standoff with Murphy and the rest of his squad. However, he eventually lowers his weapon on Vickers ' orders. A year after the defeat of Pamela Milton , Murphy is seen gardening at the Hilltop Colony . [1]
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Murphy has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Appearances[]: " New Haunts " (No Lines) " Rogue Element " (No Lines) " Rest in Peace " (No Lines)
Trivia[]: Jason Fernandes also portrays Livits and an unnamed Viper . It was confirmed by Jason Fernandes that he appeared in the episode " Rest in Peace " and was a gardener at the Hilltop Colony . [1]
Name: Murphy
